name: Untitled space game (TheDevDoc)
description:
This game is incredibly basic, and there is not much to do. Currently in active development. As of now, there are only two mission types and only one planet, but more are in development. There is also no progression in the game yet--This will be one of the first things updated. New weapons/shields/etc will be added, as well as a marketplace to spend your credits and buy them at. Feedback and bug reports are incredibly appreciated. Thank you!

CONTROLS ARE NOT EXPLAINED IN GAME, THESE ARE CONTROLS:

WASD to move

E to interact

LMB fires weapon

RMB aims
